content: crochet kit available at https //yarnsea com/en/project/2148/pocket-kitty-cat pocket kitty cat is a no-sew pattern that is quick and easy to work up a full video tutorial is included making this a beginner-friendly project make it with super bulky chenille velvet or blanket yarn to create a squishy plush for little hands to play with crocheting with thinner yarns like dk or worsted weight makes this amigurumi the perfect size for a keychain or christmas tree ornament these miniature dolls are great for craft fairs markets or kids party favors it s a unisex and gender neutral stuffed animal toy that will appeal to boys girls children adults and everyone in between it s a great last-minute birthday and holiday gift this mini kitten can also be used for therapy as a sensory fidget or stress relief object it makes a portable friend especially for people with anxiety adhd or autism the pdf pattern includes full written instructions and 30+ photos as a step-by-step photo tutorial to guide you through the doll making process **size** height 4 inches 10 cm **materials** super bulky weight 6 yarn i used hobbii honey bunny thin yarn scrap for the collar/bow 9mm plastic safety eyes x2 5mm crochet hook stuffing scissors **level** ★★☆☆☆ familiar beginner/intermediate requires familiarity with stitches used below changing colors and attaching yarn **stitches &
